verses.roman:
tabe avatari' kare jagat pālana
ananta vaibhava tāṅra nāhika gaṇana

synonyms: tabe—at that time; avatari'-descending; kare—does; jagat pālana—maintenance of the material world; ananta—unlimited; vaibhava—the opulences; tāṅra—of Him; nāhika—there is not; gaṇana—counting.
translation: He then descends to maintain the material world. His unlimited opulences cannot be counted.
